lyrics.text:
Ko e kakai na’e nofo
‘I he fu’u po’uli,
Kuo nau mamata tonu,
Ki he maama lahi.

Mo e kakai na’e nofo,
‘I he potu malu,
Ko e malu ‘o e mate,
Fakalaumālie.

Pea kuo tupu hake,
Kia kinautolu,
‘A e maama, ke nau ‘ilo,
‘A e hala lelei.

He ko e maama ‘a Sīsū,
‘Oku ulo ma’u pē,
Pea ko e maama’anga,
Ki he laumālie.

Ke tau tali ‘ene ngāue,
Pea ‘amanaki,
Ke ne tutu ‘etau maama.
Ke tau mo’ui ai.

Ke tau ‘alu ‘i he maama,
‘I he’ene ofi
‘I he loto fiefia,
Pea fakafeta’i.
